articles.title: 7 tech freebies, Facebook tracking, secure gadgets, and more: Tech Q&A
articles.description: Facebook tracking, secure gadgets and much more in this week's Tech Q&A.
articles.content:
Facebook Tracking
Q: I heard that Facebook is tracking me when I shop in retail stores now. How can I make this stop? It’s annoying and intrusive.
A: Facebook is partnering with actual stores, so they're not just collecting data from your browser but your r… [+3930 chars]
